text: Alpine skiing at the 1990 Asian Winter Para Games took place in the city of Sapporo, Japan from 10 April 1990 with four events contested â€” two each for men and women. Slalom events would later be substituted for Super Giant Slalom events in the next Winter Para Asiad but reinstated in the 1999 Winter Asian Para Games in South Korea. ==Medalists== ===Men=== Slalom Giant slalom ===Women=== Slalom Giant slalom ==Medal table== ==References== 1990 Asian Winter Para Games
title: Alpine skiing at the 1990 Asian Winter Para Games
